page.title: 16PICK YOUR OWN
page.content: In recent years the cult of{Pick your {Own}has grown considerably and in our block some of the fruit growers went over to this system, starting in 1964. Twenty-five acres are now utilsed in this way with{Strawberries,Raspberries {Blackcurrants,Gooseberries,Apples and {Pears}being grown. Rather than paying people to pick the crop, customers pick their own and pay for the quantity picked. In this way people can otain a large quantity of produce, selecting both size, variety and ripeness to suit individual taste. On a smaller scale there is one grower also inviting customers to pick their own{salad crops and vegetables. However, although still very popular the Pick your Own seems to have reached a peak and demand is now decreasing.It is not possible to say how many people use this facility.
